title: No Air
lyrics:
geu eotteon sarami dagawado
No I don't care
geu eotteon padoga deopchyeodo
nan niga issgie
nae sumeul swige haejuneun neoreul

modeun geol balkge haejuneun neoreul

nan mideo eodi issdeon

naege taeyangeun neo hanappunin geol



Day n night eonjena

nae meorien neo hanan geol

oechyeobwa neol hyanghae oechyeobwa

nae sarangi daheul su issdamyeon na

eotteon geosdo nan hal su isseo

1bun 1cho niga geuriwo

neowa na yeogiga baro Heaven

neowa na yeogiga baro Heaven



Oh meolli meolli meolli tteonago sipeo

son jaba nopi nopi nopi nal su isseo

Babe we?ll be together

chumeul chwo sesang kkeuteseo

du bareul majchwo georeumyeo sunganeul neukkyeo



nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae

No no breathing

nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae

No no breathing

nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae



Oh nuni busyeo neon Baby

sigani meomchwosseumyeon Tickin?

neowaui sungani Beautiful day

nopi tteoolla kkumeul kkun geosman gata

oh ye ye



neoreul saranghaneun mami neomu neomchyeo

naega gajin modeun geoseul nege deonjyeo

neowa na yeogiga baro Heaven

neowa na yeogiga baro Heaven



Oh meolli meolli meolli tteonago sipeo

son jaba nopi nopi nopi nal su isseo

Babe we'll be together

chumeul chwo sesang kkeuteseo

du bareul majchwo georeumyeo sunganeul neukkyeo



nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae

No no breathing

nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae

No no breathing

nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae



No Air No Air No Air No Air

No Air No Air No Air No Air No Air

No Air No Air No Air No Air No Air

No Air No Air



Yeah I Just wanna talk to you girl



nae mameun geojisi eopseo ireon jeok eopsgie

dan han beondo neukkyeobon jeogi eopsneun maeum

naui haruui kkeute ne misoreul neukkige

Oh I just wanna love you babe



useobwa geokjeong eopsi

gyeote isseuni neol chajeul piryon eopsji

eodumi geothil deusi nae kkumi

yeongwonhi meomchuji anheul

nae mameul deo bichugil uh



modu nal tteonanda haedo

nae pyeonirago haejwo

dareun geon piryo eopseo

All I want is you you

It's true true aight



nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae

No no breathing

nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae

No no breathing

nae nuni sumi maeumi neoreul wonhae



No Air No Air No Air No Air

No Air No Air No Air No Air No Air
